title: [Caffe2] Enable AMD/MIOPEN ops for Caffe2
body_html:
The goal of this PR is to enable MIOPEN operator for AMD GPU back-end.

Major changes include :

  • Caffe2 core for AMD/ROCM/HIP update
  • Caffe2 math util for AMD/ROCM/HIP
  • MIOPEN operator implementation
  • python bidding for AMD/ROCM/HIP operators
  • Cmake refactoring
body_text:
The goal of this PR is to enable MIOPEN operator for AMD GPU back-end.
Major changes include :

Caffe2 core for AMD/ROCM/HIP update
Caffe2 math util for AMD/ROCM/HIP
MIOPEN operator implementation
python bidding for AMD/ROCM/HIP operators

body:
The goal of this PR is to enable [MIOPEN](https://rocmsoftwareplatform.github.io/MIOpen/doc/html/) operator for AMD GPU back-end.

Major changes include :

- Caffe2 core for AMD/ROCM/HIP update
- Caffe2 math util for AMD/ROCM/HIP
- MIOPEN operator implementation
- python bidding for AMD/ROCM/HIP operators
- Cmake refactoring
